div0.head: This is a Test Document
div0.p: This is a test document, mainly intended to try-out the features implemented in the tei2html XSLT stylesheet. This serves the dual purpose of helping me to develop new features, and act as a cheat-sheet to look up how certain things are achieved with my stylesheet (yes, I sometimes forget myself).

div1.head: A ChapterFootnote in chapter heading. Dealing with Text Styles
div1.p:
This is a sample paragraph, with
some italic and bold text. We continue the test with some Small Caps and some letterspaced text.This is a footnote with some italic. As you can see, the preceding sentence is followed by a footnote. We also have a reference to the next chapter. It is very well possible to include some text in hieroglyphs, Inline Hieroglyphs using in-line images as shown here.

Books created with these stylesheet include: De Wereld voor de schepping van den mensch by Camille Flammarion. Books will be posted at Project Gutenberg. Text can include references to WorldCat or OpenLibrary catalog entries, for example: OLN and OCLC.
